snippet: The mob killing, prompted by the discovery of mutilated body of a boy, is the latest blow to Madagascar’s struggle to emerge from turmoil.
abstract: Several Western countries issue travel warnings about Indian Ocean island nation of Madagascar, citing mob attacks that killed two Europeans and a Madagascan accused of organ trafficking.
lead_paragraph: The mob killing, prompted by the discovery of mutilated body of a boy, is the latest blow to Madagascar’s struggle to emerge from turmoil.

headline.main: After Killings, Tourists Are Told to Avoid Madagascar
headline.print_headline: After Killings, Tourists Told To Avoid Madagascar
